description: Modifies the properties of the certificate-based authentication you want to use with your WorkSpaces.

parameters.name: ResourceId
parameters.description: The resource identifiers, in the form of directory IDs.

parameters.name: CertificateBasedAuthProperties
parameters.description: The properties of the certificate-based authentication. Status (string) --- The status of the certificate-based authentication properties. CertificateAuthorityArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services Certificate Manager Private CA resource.

nested_params.name: Status
nested_params.description: The status of the certificate-based authentication properties.

nested_params.name: CertificateAuthorityArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon Web Services Certificate Manager Private CA resource.

parameters.name: PropertiesToDelete
parameters.description: The properties of the certificate-based authentication you want to delete. (string) ---
